title: Design-Based Project Learning Program to Strengthen Elementary Mathematics Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and geometric cognition skills
context.additional_context: A large-classroom program conducted in digitally supported environments, applying design principles for low-income education based on South African case studies

learning_goals: Students can explain mathematical modeling processes for solving real-life problems with over 80% accuracy
Learners can present spatial relationships of shapes in three or more representational modes through collaborative projects
Develop the ability to systematically document the data collection and analysis process in four or more stages using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
